verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as he <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G758>chief<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day, that they <S%G3906>watched<s%> him.
And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> him which had the <S%G5203>dropsy.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> to the <S%G3544>lawyers<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day?
And they <S%G2270>held<s%> their <S%G2270>peace.<s%> And he <S%G1949>took<s%> him, and <S%G2323>healed<s%> him, and let him <S%G630>go;<s%>

And <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Which<s%> of you shall have an <S%G3688>ass<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1016>ox<s%> <S%G1706>fallen<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5421>pit,<s%> and will not <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G385>pull<s%> him out <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day? <S%G2250><s%>
And they <S%G2480>could<s%> not <S%G470>answer<s%> him <S%G470>again<s%> to <S%G5023>these<s%> things.

And he <S%G3004>put<s%> <S%G3004>forth<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> which were <S%G2564>bidden,<s%> when he <S%G1907>marked<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they <S%G1586>chose<s%> out the <S%G4411>chief<s%> <S%G4411>rooms;<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them.

<S%G3752>When<s%> you are <S%G2564>bidden<s%> of any <S%G5100><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> to a <S%G1062>wedding,<s%> <S%G2625>sit<s%> not <S%G2625>down<s%> in the <S%G4411>highest<s%> <S%G4411>room;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> a more <S%G1784>honorable<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> than you be <S%G2564>bidden<s%> of him;

And he that <S%G2564>bade<s%> you and him <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2046>say<s%> to you, <S%G1325>Give<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5117>place;<s%> and you <S%G756>begin<s%> with <S%G152>shame<s%> to <S%G2722>take<s%> the <S%G2078>lowest<s%> room. <S%G5117><s%>

But <S%G3752>when<s%> you are <S%G2564>bidden,<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> in the <S%G2078>lowest<s%> <S%G5117>room;<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> he that <S%G2564>bade<s%> you <S%G2064>comes,<s%> he may <S%G2036>say<s%> to you, <S%G5384>Friend,<s%> <S%G4320>go<s%> up <S%G511>higher:<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall you <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G1391>worship<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of them that <S%G4873>sit<s%> <S%G4873>at<s%> meat with you.
For whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5312>exalts<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>abased;<s%> and he that <S%G5013>humbles<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> to him that <S%G2564>bade<s%> him, <S%G3752>When<s%> you <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G712>dinner<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G1173>supper,<s%> <S%G5455>call<s%> not your <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G3364>nor<s%> your <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> your <S%G4773>kinsmen,<s%> nor <S%G3364><s%> your <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1069>neighbors;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G479>bid<s%> you <S%G479>again,<s%> and a <S%G468>recompense<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> you.
But <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G1403>feast,<s%> <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> the <S%G376>maimed,<s%> the <S%G5560>lame,<s%> the blind: <S%G5185><s%>

And you shall be <S%G3107>blessed;<s%> for they cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G467>recompense<s%> you: for you shall be <S%G467>recompensed<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the just. <S%G1342><s%>

And when <S%G5100>one<s%> of them that <S%G4873>sat<s%> <S%G4873>at<s%> meat with him <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is he that shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he to him, A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1173>supper,<s%> and <S%G2564>bade<s%> many: <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G649>sent<s%> his <S%G1401>servant<s%> at <S%G1173>supper<s%> <S%G5610>time<s%> to <S%G2036>say<s%> to them that were <S%G2564>bidden,<s%> <S%G2064>Come;<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G2235>now<s%> ready. <S%G2092><s%>

And they <S%G3956>all<s%> with one <S%G3391><s%> consent <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3868>make<s%> <S%G3868>excuse.<s%> The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, I have <S%G59>bought<s%> a piece of <S%G68>ground,<s%> and I <S%G2192>must<s%> <S%G318>needs<s%> <S%G1831>go<s%> and <S%G1492>see<s%> it: I <S%G2065>pray<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> me excused. <S%G3868><s%>

And <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> I have <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2201>yoke<s%> of <S%G1016>oxen,<s%> and I <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G1381>prove<s%> them: I <S%G2065>pray<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> me excused. <S%G3868><s%>
And <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> I have <S%G1060>married<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and therefore <S%G122><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G2532>So<s%> that <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3854>came,<s%> and <S%G518>showed<s%> his <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things. <S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G3617>master<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> being <S%G3710>angry<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G1831>Go<s%> out <S%G5030>quickly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4113>streets<s%> and <S%G4505>lanes<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G1521>bring<s%> in <S%G5602>here<s%> the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and the <S%G376>maimed,<s%> and the <S%G5560>halt,<s%> and the blind. <S%G5185><s%>
And the <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> it is <S%G1096>done<s%> as you have <S%G2004>commanded,<s%> and <S%G2089>yet<s%> there is room. <S%G5117><s%>

And the <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G1831>Go<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the highways <S%G1327><s%> <S%G3598><s%> and <S%G5418>hedges,<s%> and compel <S%G315><s%> them to <S%G1525>come<s%> in, that my <S%G3624>house<s%> may be filled. <S%G1072><s%>
For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G2564>bidden<s%> shall <S%G1089>taste<s%> of my supper. <S%G1173><s%>
And there <S%G4848>went<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> with him: and he <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them,

<S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man <S%G2064>come<s%> to me, and <S%G3404>hate<s%> not his <S%G3962>father,<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G5043>children,<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G79>sisters,<s%> <S%G2089>yes,<s%> and his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> be my disciple. <S%G3101><s%>
And <S%G3748>whoever<s%> does not <S%G941>bear<s%> his <S%G4716>cross,<s%> and <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me, cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> be my disciple. <S%G3101><s%>

For <S%G5101>which<s%> of you, <S%G2309>intending<s%> to <S%G3618>build<s%> a <S%G4444>tower,<s%> <S%G2523>sits<s%> not <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> and <S%G5585>counts<s%> the <S%G1160>cost,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he have <S%G2192><s%> sufficient to finish <S%G535><s%> it?

Lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3379>haply,<s%> after he has <S%G5087>laid<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation,<s%> and is not <S%G2480>able<s%> to finish <S%G1615><s%> it, <S%G3956>all<s%> that behold <S%G2334><s%> it <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G1702>mock<s%> him,
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3618>build,<s%> and was not <S%G2480>able<s%> to finish. <S%G1615><s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G4198>going<s%> to <S%G4820>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> against <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G2523>sits<s%> not <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> and <S%G1011>consults<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he be <S%G1415>able<s%> with <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> to <S%G528>meet<s%> him that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> him with <S%G1501>twenty<s%> thousand? <S%G5505><s%>

<S%G1161>Or<s%> <S%G1490>else,<s%> while the <S%G846>other<s%> is <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4206>way<s%> <S%G631>off,<s%> he <S%G649>sends<s%> an <S%G4242>ambassador,<s%> and <S%G2065>desires<s%> <S%G4314>conditions<s%> of peace. <S%G1515><s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3779>likewise,<s%> <S%G3956>whoever<s%> he be of you that <S%G657>forsakes<s%> not <S%G3956>all<s%> that he <S%G5224>has,<s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> be my disciple. <S%G3101><s%>

Salt <S%G217><s%> is <S%G2570>good:<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G217>salt<s%> have <S%G3471>lost<s%> his <S%G3471>flavor,<s%> with which <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5101><s%> shall it be seasoned? <S%G741><s%>

It is <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2111>fit<s%> for the <S%G1095>land,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> yet for the dunghill; <S%G2874><s%> but men <S%G906>cast<s%> it out. He that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
